'''Iverra''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A plump, middle-aged woman stands beside the crates. Her clothing is rumpled and her hair matted, but her eyes twinkle with triumph.}}

One of the most renowned scientists in the Vailian Republics, Iverra's dream focused on making the depths of Eora's waters accessible to kith. To that end, she has pioneered a number of diving technologies, including her famous [diving helmet](/iverrasDivingHelmet/) and a number of spells, like Renove mes Aires - "Renewal of Air". However, the profit-minded attitude of the Republics and the resulting lack of funding for her research led to her contacting the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) and offering them their services. Fleet Master Okaya arranged to have her smuggled out of the Republics in a crate, which is where the Watcher comes in.
